subject: Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Reggie Torbor, in his fourth season, will probably start for the injured Mathias Kiwanuka at strong-side linebacker Sunday and defensive tackle Fred Robbins is expected to play more snaps.
snippet: Reggie Torbor, in his fourth season, will probably start for the injured Mathias Kiwanuka at strong-side linebacker Sunday and defensive tackle Fred Robbins is expected to play more snaps.
